casebody.data:
IN RE Verna Francis Coley THETFORD, Relator NO. 02-17-00182-CV Court of Appeals of Texas, Fort Worth. DELIVERED: June 15, 2017 MARY H. BARKLEY, STEPHEN J. HUSCHKA, CANTEY HANGER LLP, FORT WORTH, TEXAS AND ROBERT E. ALDRICH, JR., ALDRICH PLLC, FORT WORTH, TEXAS, FOR RELATOR. ALFRED G. ALLEN, III, TURNER & ALLEN, GRAHAM, TEXAS AND DONALD E. HERRMANN, DAVID E. KELTNER, JOE GREENHILL, KELLY HART & HALLMAN LLP, FOR REAL PARTIES IN INTEREST. PANEL: MEIER, SUDDERTH, and PITTMAN, JJ.

MEMORANDUM OPINION 1

See Tex. R. App. P. 47.4, 52.8(d).

PER CURIAM

The court has considered relator's petition for writ of mandamus and is of the opinion that relief should be denied. Accordingly, relator's petition for writ of mandamus is denied.

Furthermore, our stay of the trial court proceedings in cause number 33186, styled Guardianship of Verna Francis Coley Thetford, an Incapacitated Person , pending in the 90th District Court of Young County, Texas, is hereby lifted.
